page.title: 13HOUSEWIFES CHORES
page.content: A housewifes chores are as follows,starting at breakfast.The housewife makes the toast by putting some bread in the grill.Then she waits for a few minutes and takes it out and puts it on a plate.Then she puts some cereal in a bowl.After she has eaten breakfast she helps get the children dressed.Then she takes the children to their school.When she gets back from taking her children to school she feeds her dog.At lunch time she makes a snack of bread,butter and yogurt. Then she cleans the house.At 6 o'clock two hours after the children come home she cooks them their tea.Then she makes their lunch for tomorow.Then the housewife help get the children ready bed.That is the end of a day of a housewifes chores.
